languages.text: "Ты приказал{mf||а} {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_RaycadExterminatus}разорвать{/d} сердце мира — старый реактор. Огонь уничтожил все, так много людских оболочек, моливших о спасении. Но темный свет отступил".

"You ordered that the world's heart, the old reactor, be {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_RaycadExterminatus}torn apart{/d}. The fire destroyed everything. So many human shells who were begging to be saved. But the dark light retreated."
languages.original_text: "Ты приказал{mf||а} {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_RaycadExterminatus}разорвать{/d} сердце мира — старый реактор. Огонь уничтожил все, так много людских оболочек, моливших о спасении. Но темный свет отступил".

traits.locale_text: "You ordered to tear apart the world's heart, the old reactor. The fire destroyed everything. So many human shells who were begging to be saved. But the dark light retreated."
"You ordered to tear apart the world's heart, the old reactor. The fire destroyed everything. So many human shells who were begging to be saved. But the dark light retreated."
"You ordered to tear apart the world's heart, the old reactor. The fire destroyed everything. So many human shells who were begging to be saved. But the dark light retreated."

"You ordered that the world's heart, the old reactor, be {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_RaycadExterminatus}torn apart{/d}. The fire destroyed everything. So many human shells who were begging to be saved. But the dark light retreated."

languages.text: « Vous avez ordonné de {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_RaycadExterminatus}déchirer{/d} le cœur du monde, le vieux réacteur. Le feu a tout détruit, toutes ces enveloppes humaines qui suppliaient d'être sauvées... Toutefois, la lumière sombre est partie. »
languages.original_text: "You ordered that the world's heart, the old reactor, be {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_RaycadExterminatus}torn apart{/d}. The fire destroyed everything. So many human shells who were begging to be saved. But the dark light retreated."

traits.locale_text: « Vous avez ordonné de détruire le cœur du monde, le vieux réacteur. Le feu a tout détruit, toutes ces enveloppes humaines qui suppliaient d'être sauvées... Toutefois, la lumière sombre est partie. »

languages.text: “你下令{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_RaycadExterminatus}撕开{/d}那个世界的心脏，启动了那个古老的反应堆。大火烧尽了一切，那么多人类的外壳乞求拯救。不过，黑暗之光也随之褪去了。”
languages.original_text: "You ordered that the world's heart, the old reactor, be {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_RaycadExterminatus}torn apart{/d}. The fire destroyed everything. So many human shells who were begging to be saved. But the dark light retreated."

traits.locale_text: “你下令撕开那个世界的心脏，启动了那个古老的反应堆。大火烧尽了一切，那么多人类的外壳乞求拯救。不过，黑暗之光也随之褪去了。”

languages.text: "Ihr habt befohlen, das Herz der Welt zu {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_RaycadExterminatus}zerreißen{/d}, den alten Reaktor. Das Feuer hat alles zerstört. So viele menschliche Hüllen, die darum gebettelt haben, gerettet zu werden. Doch das dunkle Licht hat sich zurückgezogen."
languages.original_text: "You ordered that the world's heart, the old reactor, be {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_RaycadExterminatus}torn apart{/d}. The fire destroyed everything. So many human shells who were begging to be saved. But the dark light retreated."

traits.locale_text: "Ihr habt befohlen, das Herz der Welt zu zerreißen, den alten Reaktor. Das Feuer hat alles zerstört. So viele menschliche Hüllen, die darum gebettelt haben, gerettet zu werden. Doch das dunkle Licht hat sich zurückgezogen."

languages.text: «Ordenaste {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_RaycadExterminatus}desgarrar{/d} el corazón del mundo, el viejo reactor. El fuego destruyó todo. Tantos cascarones humanos rogando que los salvaran. Pero la luz oscura retrocedió».
languages.original_text: "You ordered that the world's heart, the old reactor, be {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_RaycadExterminatus}torn apart{/d}. The fire destroyed everything. So many human shells who were begging to be saved. But the dark light retreated."

traits.locale_text: «Ordenaste desgarrar el corazón del mundo, el viejo reactor. El fuego destruyó todo. Tantos cascarones humanos rogando que los salvaran. Pero la luz oscura retrocedió».

languages.text: 「あなたは世界の心臓、古いリアクターを{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_RaycadExterminatus}破壊{/d}するよう命じた。火はすべてを破壊した。多くの人間の外殻が救いを求めていた。しかし、闇の光は退いた」
languages.original_text: "You ordered that the world's heart, the old reactor, be {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_RaycadExterminatus}torn apart{/d}. The fire destroyed everything. So many human shells who were begging to be saved. But the dark light retreated."

traits.locale_text: 「あなたは世界の心臓、古いリアクターを{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_RaycadExterminatus}破壊{/d}するよう命じた。火はすべてを破壊した。多くの人間の外殻が救いを求めていた。しかし、闇の光は退いた」

languages.text: "Dünyanın kalbinin, eski reaktörün {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_RaycadExterminatus}parçalanmasını{/d} emrettiniz. Yangın her yeri aldı. Onca insan muhafazası, kurtarılmak için yalvardı... Lakin karanlık ışık çekildi."
languages.original_text: "You ordered that the world's heart, the old reactor, be {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_RaycadExterminatus}torn apart{/d}. The fire destroyed everything. So many human shells who were begging to be saved. But the dark light retreated."

traits.locale_text: "Dünyanın kalbinin, eski reaktörün parçalanmasını emrettiniz. Yangın her yeri aldı. Kurtarılmak için yalvaran onca insan muhafazası... Lakin karanlık ışık çekildi."
